title: How to Make Washcloth Lollipops

steps.headline: Lay a washcloth on a flat surface.
Roll the bottom of the washcloth up and over.
steps.description: Continue rolling the washcloth until you have formed a tight roll.

steps.headline: Turn the washcloth 90 degrees.
steps.description: Make sure that the end with the colored lining is facing you.

steps.headline: Roll the washcloth from the bottom, up and over, until you’ve created a tight circular roll.
steps.description: The lining of the washcloth will create a colored swirl in the center of the lollipop.

steps.headline: Hold the washcloth tightly and push it into a lollipop bag.
Secure the bottom of the bag with a small rubber band so that the washcloth lollipop does not come unfurled.
Insert a baby spoon into the wrapper.
steps.description: Push until the cup of the spoon touches the bottom of the washcloth. The rubber band will hold the spoon in place.

steps.headline: Tie a decorative ribbon in a bow around the rubber band.
steps.description: The ribbon should match the washcloth colors for the most attractive look.

text: Lay a washcloth on a flat surface.  Roll the bottom of the washcloth up and over. Continue rolling the washcloth until you have formed a tight roll. Turn the washcloth 90 degrees. Make sure that the end with the colored lining is facing you. Roll the washcloth from the bottom, up and over, until you’ve created a tight circular roll. The lining of the washcloth will create a colored swirl in the center of the lollipop. Hold the washcloth tightly and push it into a lollipop bag.  Secure the bottom of the bag with a small rubber band so that the washcloth lollipop does not come unfurled.  Insert a baby spoon into the wrapper. Push until the cup of the spoon touches the bottom of the washcloth. The rubber band will hold the spoon in place. Tie a decorative ribbon in a bow around the rubber band. The ribbon should match the washcloth colors for the most attractive look.
